feed.title: Azure Architecture Center
feed.subtitle: Updated articles for Azure Architecture Center

entry.title: Tenancy Models for a Multitenant Solution
entry.summary: Learn about various tenancy models for a multitenant solution and how to choose the best multitenant architecture for your scenario.

entry.title: Hub-Spoke Network Topology That Uses Azure Virtual WAN
entry.summary: Learn how to implement a hub-spoke network topology by using Azure Virtual WAN. Create a hub virtual network and spoke virtual networks that peer with the hub.

entry.title: Windows 365 Azure Network Connection
entry.summary: Design and implement Windows 365 Azure network connections to integrate Cloud PCs with your existing network infrastructure and on-premises resources.

entry.title: Architectural Approaches for a Multitenant Solution
entry.summary: This article introduces approaches for the main categories of Azure services that you can consider when you plan a multitenant architecture.

entry.title: Prevent IPv4 Exhaustion in Azure
entry.summary: Minimize private address space consumption when you build large networks in Azure. This article presents two methods to create more IPv4 address space.

entry.title: Baseline Azure AI Foundry Chat Reference Architecture
entry.summary: Use this baseline reference architecture to learn how to build network-secured, highly available, and zone-redundant enterprise chat applications by using Azure AI Foundry, the Azure AI Agent Service, Azure OpenAI models, and Azure App Service.

entry.title: Implement SMA OpCon in Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to use SMA Technologies OpCon in a Kubernetes configuration to automate Azure and on-premises workloads that run on various servers across an enterprise.

entry.title: Build a Multiple-Agent Workflow Automation Solution with Semantic Kernel
entry.summary: Learn how to design scalable automation pipelines where multiple AI agents collaborate by using Semantic Kernel and Azure Container Apps for enterprise-grade tasks.

entry.title: Cross-Region Resiliency for SQL TDE with Azure Key Vault Managed HSM
entry.summary: This solution describes a secure and resilient deployment pattern for Azure SQL Managed Instance. It highlights how Azure Key Vault Managed HSM stores customer-managed TDE protector keys.

entry.title: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) Baseline Architecture for AKS on Azure Local
entry.summary: Learn how to design and implement a baseline architecture for Microsoft Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) that runs on Azure Local.

entry.title: Deploy and Operate Apps with AKS Enabled by Azure Arc on Azure Local
entry.summary: Build containerized app deployment pipelines for AKS on Azure Local with Azure Arc and GitOps. Learn about Flux automation for hybrid Kubernetes clusters.

entry.title: Azure Virtual Desktop Landing Zone Design Guide
entry.summary: Learn about the design areas in the Azure landing zone architecture for Azure Virtual Desktop, including resource organization and networking.

entry.title: Service-Specific Guidance for a Multitenant Solution
entry.summary: This article introduces the guidance for using many distinct Azure services in a multitenant solution to achieve business and technical goals.

entry.title: Baseline Azure AI Foundry Chat Reference Architecture in an Azure Landing Zone
entry.summary: Learn about deploying the baseline Azure AI Foundry, Foundry Agent Service, Azure OpenAI models, and Azure App Service chat architecture in an Azure landing zone.

entry.title: AI Architecture Design
entry.summary: Get started with AI. Use high-level architectural types, see Azure AI platform offerings, and find customer success stories.

entry.title: Choose a Stream Processing Technology
entry.summary: Compare options for real-time message stream processing in Azure, with key selection criteria and a capability matrix.

entry.title: Choose an Azure Container Service
entry.summary: Understand how to evaluate which Azure container service is best suited to your specific workload scenarios and requirements.

entry.title: Architectural Considerations for Choosing an Azure Container Service
entry.summary: Get a quick overview of common feature-level considerations that can help you choose an Azure container service. Part two of a series.

entry.title: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) - planning
entry.summary: An overview of Microsoft Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) guidance offerings ranging from "just starting out", to production, and through sustained operations.

entry.title: Baseline highly available zone-redundant app services web application
entry.summary: A baseline reference architecture for a network secured, highly available, and zone-redundant App Service web application.

entry.title: Considerations for updating a multitenant solution
entry.summary: This article describes considerations for updating your multitenant solution.

entry.title: DevSecOps for Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
entry.summary: Learn how to use DevSecOps for IaC to more securely and efficiently deploy cloud infrastructure into a new Azure landing zone.

entry.title: Deploy IBM Maximo Application Suite (MAS) on Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to run IBM Maximo Application Suite (MAS) on Azure. See guidance for designing and implementing cloud solutions with MAS 8.5 and up that use Azure.

entry.title: Use Azure Firewall to help protect an AKS cluster
entry.summary: Deploy an AKS cluster in a hub-and-spoke network topology by using Terraform and Azure DevOps. Help protect inbound and outbound traffic by using Azure Firewall.

entry.title: Azure Resource Manager Considerations for Multitenancy
entry.summary: Learn how to use the features of Azure Resource Manager when you work with multitenant systems, and get links to guidance and examples.

entry.title: SAP S/4HANA in Linux on Azure
entry.summary: Learn more about proven practices for running SAP S/4HANA effectively in a Linux environment on Azure with high availability.

entry.title: Deploy Microservices with Azure Container Apps and Dapr
entry.summary: Build a serverless microservices solution on Azure Container Apps by using Distributed Application Runtime (Dapr) and Kubernetes event-driven autoscaling (KEDA).

entry.title: Use AI to forecast customer orders
entry.summary: Learn how to use AI and machine learning to forecast a customer's future order quantity for a specific SKU.

entry.title: Minimal storage – change feed to replicate data
entry.summary: Architecture for a high-availability solution that uses two Azure storage services, one for quick access to high-demand data, the other for low-demand data.

entry.title: Use AI enrichment with image and text processing
entry.summary: Learn how to transform unstructured image and text data into full-text searchable content with Azure AI Search prebuilt skills and custom skills.

entry.title: Building the First Layer of Defense with Azure Security Services
entry.summary: Secure your IT environment by using Azure security services and Azure Security Benchmark. This article is part of a series.

entry.title: Data streaming with AKS
entry.summary: Use AKS to easily ingest and process a real-time data stream, with millions of data points collected via sensors.

entry.title: Highly available SharePoint farm
entry.summary: Deploy a highly available SharePoint farm for intranet capabilities that uses Microsoft Entra ID, a SQL always on instance, and SharePoint resources.

entry.title: Build ETL pipelines with Azure Databricks and Delta Lake
entry.summary: Create ETL pipelines for batch and streaming data with Azure Databricks to simplify data lake ingestion at any scale.

entry.title: Map threats to your IT environment
entry.summary: Diagram the IT environment of your organization and develop a threat map to plan and build your defensive layer of security. This article is the second in a part of a series.

entry.title: Build the second layer of defense with Microsoft Defender XDR Solutions
entry.summary: Add additional security to your IT environment by using Microsoft 365 security service in addition to Azure security. This article is part of a series. Now with the information about Sentinel running in the unified portal.

entry.title: Integrate Azure and Microsoft Defender XDR security services
entry.summary: Integrate security solutions from Azure and Microsoft 365 to create robust security for your hybrid and cloud IT environments. This article is part of a series.

entry.title: Migrate IBM mainframe apps to Azure with TmaxSoft OpenFrame
entry.summary: Migrate IBM zSeries mainframe applications to Azure. Use a no-code approach that TmaxSoft OpenFrame offers for this lift and shift operation.

entry.title: Multilayered protection for Azure virtual machines
entry.summary: Protect access to Azure VMs through a multilayer approach, using Azure and Entra ID security services. These recommendations align with security principles and best practices, such as defense in depth, least privilege, and zero trust.

entry.title: Project 15 Open Platform IoT Sustainability
entry.summary: Learn how to use Internet of Things technologies with the Project 15 Open Platform to accelerate innovation in species tracking, ecosystem monitoring, and other areas.

entry.title: SAP S/4 HANA for Large Instances
entry.summary: With large SAP HANA instances, use Azure Virtual Machines, OS clustering, and NFS storage for scalability, performance, high reliability, and disaster recovery.

entry.summary: Use Microsoft Fabric and Azure Databricks to build a modern data platform architecture designed for small and medium businesses.

entry.summary: Run Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster in multiple regions to achieve high availability.

entry.summary: Best practices for implementing access controls as per Requirement 7, 8, and 9 of PCI-DSS 3.2.1.

entry.summary: Learn about deployment options for both platform and application landing zones in Azure to help ensure governance and cost efficiency.

entry.title: Analytics end-to-end with Azure Synapse
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure Data Services to build a modern analytics platform capable of handling the most common data challenges in an organization.

entry.title: Automated API deployments using APIOps
entry.summary: Use APIOps with an Azure API Management instance to build and deploy APIs. This solution provides self-service tools, auditing, policy enforcement, and early feedback.

entry.title: Certificate Lifecycle Management on Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to create an infrastructure and workflow to automate the renewal process for certificates issued by a nonintegrated certification authority (CA).

entry.title: Monolithic Persistence Antipattern
entry.summary: Learn about the Monolithic Persistence antipattern, which can weaken performance by putting all of an application's data into a single data store.

entry.title: General Mainframe Refactor to Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to refactor general mainframe applications to run more cost-effectively and efficiently on Azure by using AKS or virtual machines.

entry.title: Compare AWS and Azure Identity Management Solutions
entry.summary: Learn about comparable AWS and Azure identity management solutions so that you can efficiently migrate solutions.

entry.title: Unisys ClearPath MCP Virtualization on Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to apply Unisys virtualization technologies to migrate a legacy Unisys ClearPath Forward Libra mainframe to Azure.

entry.title: Core startup stack architecture
entry.summary: See an example and understand the components of a simple core startup stack architecture for an initial MVP or prototype.

entry.title: Unisys ClearPath Forward OS 2200 Enterprise Server Virtualization on Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to use virtualization technologies from Microsoft partner Unisys with an existing Unisys ClearPath Forward (CPF) Dorado enterprise server.

entry.title: Multitenancy and Azure OpenAI
entry.summary: Learn how to deploy Azure OpenAI models and work with the features associated with each model when you have a multitenant system.

entry.title: Generative AI Operations for Organizations with MLOps Investments
entry.summary: Extend existing MLOps investments to include generative AI operations. Learn where you can apply existing investments and where you need to extend those investments.

entry.title: Cloud Design Patterns
entry.summary: Learn about design patterns for building reliable, scalable, and more secure applications in the cloud with examples based on Microsoft Azure.

entry.title: Design and Develop a RAG Solution
entry.summary: Learn about what to consider when you design a large language model RAG solution, including each step of the development process and how to evaluate those steps.

entry.title: Use Azure Front Door to Secure AKS Workloads
entry.summary: Learn how to secure AKS workloads by using end-to-end TLS encryption, Azure Front Door Premium, an Azure Private Link service, and the NGINX ingress controller.

entry.title: Implement Advanced Monitoring for Azure OpenAI Through a Gateway
entry.summary: Learn how to implement advanced monitoring scenarios for Azure OpenAI Service, like chargeback and auditing, via accessing the Azure OpenAI Service through a gateway.

entry.title: Circuit Breaker Pattern
entry.summary: Learn how to handle faults that might take varying amounts of time to fix when applications connect to a remote service or resource.

entry.title: Networking architecture design
entry.summary: Learn about sample architectures, solutions, and guides that can help you explore the various networking services in Azure.

entry.title: Build and Deploy Custom Document Processing Models on Azure
entry.summary: Learn more about Azure options for orchestrating, storing, building, deploying, and using custom document processing models.

entry.title: Data partitioning strategies
entry.summary: View guidance on separating data partitions to be managed and accessed separately in different services, such as Azure AI Search, Azure storage queues, and more.

entry.title: Choose a search data store
entry.summary: Learn about the capabilities of search data stores in Azure and the key criteria for choosing one that best matches your needs.

entry.title: Intelligent e-commerce product search engine
entry.summary: This example scenario shows how using a dedicated search service can dramatically increase the relevance of search results for your e-commerce customers.

entry.title: Access an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) API Server
entry.summary: Learn more about how to connect to an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster's API server. Possibilities include Azure Bastion, ExpressRoute, and Cloud Shell.

entry.title: Google Cloud to Azure services comparison
entry.summary: Compare Google Cloud and Microsoft Azure services. Not every Google Cloud service or Azure service is listed, and not every matched service has exact feature parity.

entry.title: Microsoft Entra security for AWS
entry.summary: Learn how Microsoft Entra ID can help secure and protect Amazon Web Services (AWS) identity management and account access. Discover Microsoft security solutions.

entry.title: Failure mode analysis
entry.summary: Get information about doing a failure mode analysis (FMA) for cloud solutions that are based on Azure.

entry.title: Use the Many-Models Approach to Scale Machine Learning Models
entry.summary: Learn how to manage and deploy a many-models architecture by using Azure Machine Learning and compute clusters to scale machine learning models.

entry.title: Microservices Architecture on Azure Kubernetes Service
entry.summary: Learn about the infrastructure and DevOps considerations to deploy and run a microservices architecture on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).

entry.title: Mission-Critical Baseline with App Service
entry.summary: Learn how to deploy mission-critical web applications by using the Web Apps feature of Azure App Service and the reliable web app pattern.

entry.title: Certificate Lifecycle Management on Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to create an infrastructure and workflow to automate the renewal process for certificates issued by a nonintegrated certification authority (CA).

entry.title: Azure Local baseline reference architecture
entry.summary: Learn how to design Azure Local for highly available virtualized and containerized workloads

entry.title: Azure Local storage switchless architecture
entry.summary: Learn how to design Azure Local infrastructure by using a storage switchless architecture.

entry.title: Troubleshoot a hybrid VPN connection
entry.summary: Learn tips for how to troubleshoot a VPN gateway connection between an on-premises network and Azure.

entry.title: Migrate IBM z/OS OLTP Workloads to Azure
entry.summary: Migrate a z/OS online transaction processing (OLTP) workload to an Azure application that is cost effective, responsive, scalable, and adaptable.

entry.title: Replicate Mainframe and Midrange Data to Azure by Using Qlik
entry.summary: Learn how to use Qlik Replicate to migrate mainframe and midrange systems to the cloud or extend those systems by using cloud applications.

entry.title: Modernize Mainframe and Midrange Data
entry.summary: Learn how to modernize IBM mainframe and midrange data. Use a data-first approach to migrate the data to scalable and more secure cloud storage on Azure.

entry.title: Rehost IMS DC and IMS DB on Azure by Using Raincode IMSql
entry.summary: Learn how to rehost IBM IMS DC and IMS DB on Azure by using Raincode IMSql. Rehost seamlessly without translating or changing your application.

entry.title: Replicate and Sync Mainframe Data to Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to replicate data while you modernize mainframe and midrange systems. Sync on-premises data with Azure data during modernization.

entry.title: Manage and Deploy Kubernetes in Azure Arc
entry.summary: Learn how Azure Arc extends Kubernetes cluster management and configuration across customer data centers, edge locations, and multiple cloud environments.

entry.title: Web API Design Best Practices
entry.summary: Learn how to apply best practices for designing RESTful web APIs that support platform independence and loose coupling for service evolution.

entry.title: Choose an Azure storage service
entry.summary: Use this guide to decide which Azure storage service best suits your application.

entry.title: Choose an Analytical Data Store in Azure
entry.summary: Evaluate analytical data store options for big data by reviewing key selection criteria and a capability matrix to compare database models and features.

entry.title: Choose an Azure AI Targeted Language Processing Technology
entry.summary: Learn about Azure AI services targeted language processing capabilities, including NLP, text analytics, translation, and document data extraction.

entry.title: Choose an Azure AI Services Technology
entry.summary: Learn about Azure AI services that you can use in AI applications and data flows. Choose the appropriate service for your use case.

entry.title: Azure Load Testing with Custom Plugins for Event Hubs and IoT Hub to Simulate Device Behaviors
entry.summary: Learn how to design KPIs and develop a dashboard for Azure Load Testing with custom JMeter plugins to simulate device behaviors.

entry.title: AKS Day-2 Guide: Patch and Upgrade Guidance
entry.summary: Learn about day-2 patching and upgrading practices for Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) worker nodes and Kubernetes versions.

entry.title: Computer Forensics Chain of Custody in Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to create an infrastructure and workflow to help ensure a valid digital evidence chain of custody (CoC) for computer forensics in Azure.

entry.title: SAP workload automation using SUSE on Azure
entry.summary: The SUSE SAP automation solution speeds deployment of SAP infrastructure on Azure. Use it to bolster productivity and facilitate innovation.

entry.title: Azure Firewall and Application Gateway for Virtual Networks
entry.summary: Learn about options and best practices for how to use Azure Firewall and Azure Application Gateway security in virtual networks.

entry.title: BCDR for Azure Data Factory and Azure Synapse Analytics pipelines
entry.summary: See automated and user-managed methods to achieve business continuity and disaster recovery (BCDR) for Data Factory and Azure Synapse pipelines.
